data.what_is:
Netmera is an omni-channel customer engagement marketing platform that provides personalized customer experiences. The platform allows digital marketers and product managers to increase revenue & ROI with mobile & web push notifications, in-app messaging, pop-ups, analytics and marketing automation powered by AI.

Netmera reaches 450 million users worldwide and sends 12 billion push notifications every month. Netmera helps companies reach, convert and retain their customers.
data.product_description: Netmera enables marketers to create, schedule, and segment push notifications.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for apps with up to 10K MAUs

plan_features: Automated user segmentation powered by AI

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Optimization
features.content: Optimizes marketing campaigns for mobile devices.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Facilitates global text message and mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: Application Attribution
features.content: Attributes app installs to the marketing campaigns and media sources that drove it.

features.name: Campaign Analysis
features.content: Measures impact and effectiveness of mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Uninstall Tracking
features.content: As reported in 10 Netmera reviews. Measures user-level uninstall insights.

features.name: Proximity Marketing
features.content: Collects geo-location data on mobile users to customize relevant campaigns.

features.name: Push Notifications
features.content: Pushes notifications or text messages to mobile devices This feature was mentioned in 11 Netmera reviews.

features.name: Bulk SMS
features.content: Provides templates for mass mobile messaging campaigns

features.name: Email Campaigns
features.content: Personalizes and optimizes email mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Audience Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 11 Netmera reviews. Identifies the most granular audience segments based on actions, inactions, and user properties.

features.name: Customize
features.content: Allow users to customize their messages. This feature was mentioned in 11 Netmera reviews.

features.name: Scheduling
features.content: As reported in 12 Netmera reviews. Schedule push notifications to be delivered at a specific date and time, or set an expiration for time-bound messages

features.name: Retarget
features.content: Retarget your messages based on previous user engagement. 11 reviewers of Netmera have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 12 Netmera reviews. Segment audience based on device type, location, demographics, customer behavior, etc.

features.name: Triggered Notifications
features.content: Automate notifications based on user behavior This feature was mentioned in 13 Netmera reviews.

features.name: Coupons and Promotions
features.content: Sends out coupons and promotions to reward and entice mobile device users.

features.name: Integration
features.content: Integrates with software or mobile apps via SDK or API

features.name: Geofencing
features.content: Allows users to designate geofences for location-based marketing campaigns

features.name: Wi-Fi Marketing
features.content: Targets customers based on their Wi-Fi connection

features.name: Beacons
features.content: Integrates with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) beacons to execute location-based marketing campaigns

features.name: IP Geolocation
features.content: Targets customers based on IP data

features.name: Geolocation
features.content: Identifies users when they enter or exit a predefined geolocation

features.name: Campaign Automation
features.content: Generates an automated notification, text message, or in-app message to users in a predefined geolocation

features.name: Analytics
features.content: Analyzes the performance of location-based marketing campaigns based on foot traffic, POS data, etc.

features.name: Security Compliance
features.content: Meets compliance standards (e.g. GDPR, CCPA) regarding personal data privacy

features.name: Campaign Performance
features.content: Track and report on performance metrics and conversions 12 reviewers of Netmera have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Audience Insights
features.content: As reported in 11 Netmera reviews. Report on audience demographics and engagement

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 12 Netmera reviews. Test variations of a push notification on a portion of users and track conversions

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Based on 12 Netmera reviews. Personalize messages with contextual data such as customer names or product recommendations

features.name: Rich Notifications
features.content: As reported in 12 Netmera reviews. Enhance messages with images, emojis, animated gifs, or videos

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Integrate with third-party marketing or e-commerce software 13 reviewers of Netmera have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
If you are very interested in datas and the rates, Netmera is the best. You can see all of the data, time, audiance in a very detailed way and also you can create your audiances with those parameters.

What do you dislike about Netmera?
There are so many reports and details that it is very difficult to decide which one to do from where.

What problems is Netmera solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can easily segment our audiences who do not open push notifications or who look at various campaigns but do not see them and send push from there. It made our job very easy in this regard.

Netmera is very competitive in terms of product but a top-notch in terms of services orivided to the clients.

Nothing significant in terms of dislikes about Netmera.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great tool for customer engagement. Easy to use and effective in terms of flexibility
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
Netmera is a highly effective tool that helps us strengthen our customer relationship.  We also liked how the team approached us when we had suggestions to make our experience better. They valued our feedback and always tried to solve our demands.

What do you dislike about Netmera?
Their tool can occasionally be complicated, which can make the entire user experience for consultants challenging, this leads long response time in terms of new feature requests or supports.

What problems is Netmera solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thanks to Netmera, we are closer to our customers when we need to connect. It allows us to communicate when we have important updates or changes, or simply when we want to get in touch with our customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
Netmera offers a wide range of services such as push notification, pop-up, in-app, SMS and e-mail. Reaching customers through all possible channels is crucial to improving the customer experience and staying in touch as much as possible. It is very convenient to manage all these channels from one tool. Netmera also provides a variety of reports (dashboard, graphs, funnels, tables etc.)  that supports your business decisions.

The interface is user-friendly, clean, easy to learn and use. It helps you take actions very quickly and run different campaigns without much effort. In case you do not feel comfortable using the tool or have enough confidence yet, Netmera team supports you through every step until you decide you can manage your actions on your own. Also, their support system helps you with any problem or question you have, just explain the situation you need help with and wait for their response for possible solutions.

Another thing I like about Netmera is that they are a fast growing company so our feedbacks are considered crucial for their improvement. Anything we tell about the interface, the services or new features that can be added to the tool is taken seriosuly and many of them are getting developed.

What do you dislike about Netmera?
Although many of its features are easy to use, there are a few that are a little confusing and complex. But I appreciate their efforts for getting better everyday and making the tool more convenient.

What problems is Netmera solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing all channels from one tool
Getting analytics of every notification
Being in touch with customer in and out of the app

initial_reviews.review_title: Handle your Campaign management with true Omni-channel way of Customer engagement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
We were on our way to launch a new service setup business as an add-on to our existing product line business. And that's where we used Netmera's marketing and campaign management platform. This helped us reach thousands of our end users in all forms of set up and made our campaign successful. We were able to push notifications through the web and mobile-based setups. It also helped us to learn and understand our customer base and accordingly market it.

What do you dislike about Netmera?
Netmera is a great tool and it can transform the entire journey of go-to-market setup. But sometimes these tools can be overcomplicated and can make the entire user experience for consultants difficult. It takes a huge amount of time to manage and check each node and that makes life complex for technical consultants. Operating on its might be a humongous task, but they have a good support team to help you there.

What problems is Netmera solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were launching our Service set up for an investment product that was already on the market. We had this challenge of whether we will be able to put this across to our customers or not. And that's when we took this challenge with help of Netmera to help us with the OMNI-CHANNEL approach of pushing this. And soon we start getting insights into our customer behaviours. We were getting inputs on each of its features and our customer's likes and dislikes. This helped us re-shape our offerings and accordingly navigate further.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
Netmera offers a wide range of services such as push notification, pop-up, in-app, SMS and e-mail. Reaching customers through all possible channels is crucial to improving the customer experience and staying in touch as much as possible. It is very convenient to manage all these channels from one tool. Netmera also provides a variety of reports (dashboard, graphs, funnels, tables etc.)  that supports your business decisions.

Also, their support system helps you with any problem or question you have, just explain the situation you need help with and wait for their response for possible solutions.

all_reviews.review_title: Handle your Campaign management with true Omni-channel way of Customer engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netmera?
We were on our way to launch a new service setup business as an add-on to our existing product line business. And that's where we used Netmera's marketing and campaign management platform. This helped us reach thousands of our end users in all forms of set up and made our campaign successful. We were able to push notifications through the web and mobile-based setups. It also helped us to learn and understand our customer base and accordingly market it.

What do you dislike about Netmera?
Netmera is a great tool and it can transform the entire journey of go-to-market setup. But sometimes these tools can be overcomplicated and can make the entire user experience for consultants difficult. It takes a huge amount of time to manage and check each node and that makes life complex for technical consultants. Operating on its might be a humongous task, but they have a good support team to help you there.

What problems is Netmera solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were launching our Service set up for an investment product that was already on the market. We had this challenge of whether we will be able to put this across to our customers or not. And that's when we took this challenge with help of Netmera to help us with the OMNI-CHANNEL approach of pushing this. And soon we start getting insights into our customer behaviours. We were getting inputs on each of its features and our customer's likes and dislikes. This helped us re-shape our offerings and accordingly navigate further.
